analysis.description:
TorusCoin.allocateFounderTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0xefc6d9d05d41134b1f44b379e319079ef2855edb.sol#326-345) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/7/0xefc6d9d05d41134b1f44b379e319079ef2855edb.sol#327-330)

TorusCoin.inflate (/unique_chucks/7/0xefc6d9d05d41134b1f44b379e319079ef2855edb.sol#365-379) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > endDatetime) (/unique_chucks/7/0xefc6d9d05d41134b1f44b379e319079ef2855edb.sol#370-372)

TorusCoin.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xefc6d9d05d41134b1f44b379e319079ef2855edb.sol#239)
TorusCoin.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/7/0xefc6d9d05d41134b1f44b379e319079ef2855edb.sol#239-240)
